name: Pang: The Tainted Forest
description:
A forest in agony, and an unlikely hero.

Take on the role of a small rat to free the forest from mysterious pollution in this reimagining of the classic arcade game Pang.

The game features:

  • 18 different levels with platforms and climbable stairs
  • Multiple power-ups and different weapons
  • Highscore system
  • Beautiful 2D hand-drawn graphics

Pang: The Tainted Forest was created as a three-month student project for Games Academy in Tampere University of Applied Sciences.

Programmers
Jere Joensuu
Joni Nevala

Artists

Niina Lahti
Nina Lahti
